posts.post_content:
Offered here are 3 1914 B18 Blankets. All have very nice fronts with great color and clarity and the essential 4 brown borders. Gainor has some toning on and off on the back. Snodgrass has some discoloration and is a tad dirty, Konetchy has a black mark and some staining from the original tax stamp
Gainor white infield 18.00 sold
Snodgrass Red Pennants 18.00 sold
Konetchy Tougher Red Pennants 36.00

  USPS first class mail with Paypal f & f
